results.title: Simvastatin in the Treatment of Colorectal Cancer: A Review
results.text_hl: The survival benefits are then analyzed by combining the re-positioned drugs with conventional @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ treatment methods. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ is a clinically commonly used @DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipidemia@@@ drug and exerts the effect of preventing @<m>DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular diseases@@@.

results.title: Optimizing statin therapy for primary prevention of cardiovascular disease in type 2 diabetes mellitus patients: Exploring dose, class, and intensity
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_pitavastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C108475 @@@Pitavastatin@@@ was found to have the lowest @<m>DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@CVD@@@ risk among the different classes of statins, followed by @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Fluvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077340 @@@fluvastatin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@.

results.title: Vitiligo: The Association With Metabolic Syndrome and the Role of Simvastatin as an Immunomodulator
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@, a potent statin drug used widely in @DISEASE_Dyslipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D050171 @@@dyslipidemia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular diseases@@@, also possesses antioxidant and anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ properties by its action on @GENE_CD8A @GENE_925 @@@CD8@@@+ T cells.
